attributes.action: Criminal investigation/Independent public inquiry into the uk banking system and make the bankers accountable for their actions not the public!.
attributes.additional_details:
We Demand a Full Public Enquiry/Criminal investigation into the cause of the UK Financial Crisis. Those individuals responsible in the Banking sector should be held accountable. They should be investigated, face trial and prosecuted in accordance with the law. The UK public should not be penalised for the actions of those individuals- stop the cuts. No individual in this sector will recieve bonuses and All public funds-BAILOUTS- shoulds be repaid.
ITS TIME THE PUBLIC STOPPED PAYING FOR THE FINANCIAL CRISIS AND LET THOSE RESPONSIBLE, THE BANKERS PAY.
